title: MPMD
author: MPMD
content: Hey,Im researching the instawallet hack and many people lost a significant amount of BTC on this hack. Would anyone be able to share the address or the tx hash of this incident? Unfortunately, this info isnt openly available and Instawallet never shared any specifics on the hack so its impossible to do some research on it.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I tried to search a bit and I learn something about instawallet being compromised and decided to closed its service on April 3rd, 2013.I can't found much more on Google so I tried to search here on the forum and found this one "Paymium (Bitcoin-Central/Instawallet) principals stole over a million dollars."The data(addresses and TXID) they provided from that might be the one you looking for.

comments.author: MPMD
comments.body: thank you, Ill take a look! It would be great if a victim comes forward and share one address... the technology now its far better than when the hack took place so maybe there could be some hope.
